message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about animal adaptations for different seasons. Bears get ready for winter by growing a thicker coat of fur. Option (B) is also incorrect because bears actually grow thicker fur, not thinner. Option (D) is unrelated to bear adaptations for the changing seasons.
